This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Master rank in Flex ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Grandmaster rank in Flex ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Challenger rank in Flex ranked queue

53036.description: Victorious Blitzcrank was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2021 season.

53047.name: Zenith Games Blitzcrank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

53047.description: Originally a bomb defusal robot, Blitzcrank was made a referee because of their ability to make split-second adjustments to stay ahead of the prodigious athletes. Only later did everyone realize that the bot's background made them unusually effective in defusing the intense... disagreements that often arise.

54001.name: Shamrock Malphite
54001.description: Malphite is a twenty-ton rock man who used to be part of an even larger rock that was destroyed, leaving him orphaned on a distinctly un-rocklike plane of existence. The guy could use a little luck.

54002.name: Coral Reef Malphite
54002.description: “When I was young, I used to watch our ships sail back to port—but of late can't bring myself to look. For every vessel that docks, another runs aground of coral that was not there before. It's as though even the seabed has turned against us, slowly moving toward some unfathomable end.”

54004.name: Obsidian Malphite
54004.description: As great mountains were ripped from their foundations during the rise of the Ashen Lord, from deep beneath them climbed strange, obsidian creatures, freed for the first time after thousands of years. They seem intent on stopping the Infernals, and are uniquely suited to defeating them.

54006.name: Mecha Malphite
54006.description: Designated M-2, the “Mecha Malphite” unit is a massive, bipedal fortress capable of turning into a planetary drill—making it the ultimate defensive option when faced with new and powerful kaiju. A single punch from its gauntlets can blow holes through thick titanium sheeting, and such attacks have felled countless monsters.

54007.name: Ironside Malphite
54007.description: There are two kinds of mercenaries in the game today: the first being your rank-and-file sellsword, barely worth the stink of grog on his breath. The second is a nigh-indestructible golem, twenty feet tall, and made from the hull of a legendary gunship. Choose wisely.

54016.name: Odyssey Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

54016.description: Malphite was once the pit boss of a deep space mining operation, until Jinx cracked the asteroid in half and got them both fired. His enduring loyalty to someone who is very obviously a psychopath has landed him in all kinds of danger across the galaxy, but he honestly doesn't seem to mind.

54023.name: Dark Star Malphite
54023.description: The remnants of a once lush and enormous exo-planet, the Dark Star consumed and reformed the broken cluster of planetary debris into a twisted consciousness, ever pulling others into its orbit, and unleashing oblivion upon all who cross its path.

54024.name: Prestige Dark Star Malphite
54024.description: Gilded by the Dark Star's touch and empowered through its radiance, Malphite barrels across space, demolishing entire systems and consuming the broken remnants into his immense and twisted form.

54025.name: FPX Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

54025.description: Honoring Doinb's winning performance as Malphite during the 2019 World Championship.

54027.name: Old God Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

54027.description: Appearing to mortals as a Jet-Black Ibex, Malphite was an Old God of the mountain slain by the Eclipse order and cast down onto the rocks below. Death did not claim him, but the mountain did—and now he rises in its hulking earthen form, the land itself twisted with hatred and consumed by new and terrible hungers.

54037.name: Lunar Guardian Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.

54037.description: Malphite was one of three guardians of the Yun Tal Empire, a demi-god of crag and magma, his brothers-in-arms a serpent of water and a spirit of nature. Their friendship ended in an instant, when one guardian's infinitesimal betrayal led to the death of another. Now, Malphite stands alone with unwavering loyalty, desperate to restore his nation's former glory, no matter the cost of lives.

55002.name: Red Card Katarina
55002.description: Is that a regulation uniform? No. Should a referee be holding a large dagger in the middle of a sports game? No. Are you going to argue with a woman in a non-regulation uniform holding a large dagger in the middle of a sports game? I think we both know the answer to that.

55003.name: Bilgewater Katarina
55003.description: To outsiders, the politics of Bilgewater seem a mean mess of villainous scum and dishonorable thieves. But woven throughout are complex loyalties, solemn codes of honor, and a very specific (if bloody) way of doing things. Cutting through it all is Katarina, a master of the blade. She silences the right tongues at all the right moments… for the right price.

55004.name: Kitty Cat Katarina
55004.description: There are times when Katarina deeply questions the parameters of her assassination missions. This is, somehow, not one of those times.

55007.name: Slay Belle Katarina
55007.description: Donning a mishmash of Snowdown fashions to throw targets off her scent, Katarina uses the holidays as a cover for high profile assassinations. If you hear the sound of jingle bells... run.

55008.name: Warring Kingdoms Katarina

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

55008.description: In open defiance of her clan, Katarina has left behind the life of a princess to hunt the greatest heroes of the Warring Kingdoms. Striking under shadow of night, she is slowly cutting her way through her foes… one general at a time.

55009.name: PROJECT: Katarina
55009.description: Once an ambitious lieutenant in the G/NETIC rebellion, Katarina returned to the Command Line after a confrontation with Ashe herself. Her hyper edge daggers now serve PROJECT once more, but those rebels who knew her still hold out hope that she fights for them from the inside.

55010.name: Death Sworn Katarina
55010.description: To fully swear oneself to Death's service, a mortal must be prepared to sacrifice the living. A skilled assassin in life, Katarina pledged her sinister blades willingly, and was granted spectral abilities allowing her to pass in and out of the underworld with ease.

55012.name: Battle Academia Katarina

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.
Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 Trials event.

55012.description: Katarina is a rough-edged loner who stays far away from the politics of Durandal Academy. A 2nd year student with a chip on her shoulder, she is also a top member of the Assassin Club—the only club on campus allowed to kill opponents in school-sanctioned duels. Few other students ever dare approach her.

55021.name: Blood Moon Katarina

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

55021.description: An honored priestess of the Blood Moon cult, merged with the flesh of her demon as all priestesses are fated to be. Yet the descent of the Blood Moon has changed the nature of demons and humankind, and Katarina has begun her ascent into a newer, darker form.

55029.name: Battle Queen Katarina

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Battle Queens event.

55029.description: Katarina won the Schemean crest with a ruthless performance in her queendom's battle pits. For Schema to break free of its humble alliances and become the region's rightful leader, it will take a similarly commanding performance in the Coronation—and Katarina has never been more prepared to cement her fearsome status as the rightful queen of queens.

55037.name: High Noon Katarina

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

55037.description: “My people got swindled. I aim to collect what we're owed,” the Outsider says, pinning her dagger in a wanted poster of the Mechanical Devil. Her eyes burn like stoked coal as she fixes each dusty traveler in her gaze, “And I hear y'all plan on jumpin' the Sulfur Rail, Harbingers. If you're gonna take this devil down, I want in.”

56001.name: Frozen Terror Nocturne
56001.description: Somewhere, hidden beneath the enormous ice caps, lurks a demon fueled by the terror of those foolish enough to enter his domain.

56004.name: Haunting Nocturne
56004.description: Haunting Nocturne would be a lot less haunting without those huge knife arms.

56005.name: Eternum Nocturne
56005.description: Your worst nightmare, embodied in the form of organic metal—it lingers, watching and waiting for the right moment to shroud all of existence in eternal darkness.

56006.name: Cursed Revenant Nocturne
56006.description: In her dreams, the queen was approached by a great shadow whispering of power and infamy beyond the grasp of mortals. Upon the shadow's third visit, she released it into the waking world—and sure enough, it would come to keep its terrible promises.

56007.name: Old God Nocturne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

56007.description: The great corpses of the Old Gods fed the land, and in time even the Elderwood would come to grow over their putrid rot–hiding it, perhaps, for a time. But the Gods never truly died and, with the resurgence of the Coven, one has risen again–Nocturne, the Eternal Nightmare.

56016.name: Hextech Nocturne
56016.description: Not every part of the Hextech renaissance led to bright innovations. A clandestine experiment to fuse Hextech with demonic energies wrought a living nightmare, a predator rumored to stalk the streets and back alleyways of the city. Authorities report that any such creation would have been terminated along with any such project, and that any missing persons reports are, of course, completely unrelated.

57001.name: Charred Maokai
57001.description: Once a steward of the gentle treefolk, Maokai was consumed along with his people when the Infernals ravaged the world. Now, brimming with rage, he seeks only to spread his anger and misery to anything that crosses his path.

57003.name: Festive Maokai
57003.description: Big, jolly, and possessed by a literal holiday spirit, the living fir tree known as Maokai loves nothing more than to unwrap the presents tucked under him every year. He would prefer to do this away from the fire.

57004.name: Haunted Maokai
57004.description: Few locals dare to trick-or-treat past the forest just outside of town. Too many have vanished within that dreary woodland, where one feels the weight of unseen eyes, and even the trees are driven by a terrible hunger…

57005.name: Goalkeeper Maokai
57005.description: Debuting in the 2014 Soccer Cup, much of Maokai's career has rested on the Order United goalposts growing out of his back. As Maokai is a giant tree, you have to be pretty good to score on him.

57006.name: Meowkai
57006.description: Maokai has, at long last, embraced his role as a giant, haunted scratching post.

57007.name: Victorious Maokai
57007.description: Victorious Maokai was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2016 season. Victorious Maokai lays down his roots fashionably with vines of golden leaves, and a rich blue and gold robe.

57016.name: Worldbreaker Maokai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

57016.description: An immense tree-like golem, Maokai grew from the very roots of the world, charred though they were by the last annihilation. Burdened to revive the world after every destructive cycle, he wanders for all eternity, reseeding the earth with his magical saplings, making way for the renewal of life…  only for it to be undone once more.

57024.name: Astronaut Maokai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

57024.description: The first tree to grow on planet M33P, Maokai gained sentience due to the latent power of the meeps that took up residence in his trunk. He now fosters life on this new home of his, collecting and caring for young meeps that could use a helping hand (or branch).

58003.name: Bloodfury Renekton
58003.description: This blood-crazed killing machine scours the battlefield to sate the Bloodstone. The more he slays, the more he fuels his powers. This in turn feeds his frenzy, creating a never ending cycle of spilt viscera and gore.

58005.name: Scorched Earth Renekton
58005.description: What is an Infernal but the screams beckoning from the darkest corners of mortal imagination? For centuries they were considered nothing more than myth—and yet, now, monstrosities such as Renekton roam freely, punishing us all for the last fleeting gasp of our own hubris.

58006.name: Pool Party Renekton
58006.description: Lifeguard on duty! Seriously though, be careful—you don't want CPR from a nine foot tall crocodile man.

58007.name: Prehistoric Renekton
58007.description: A rare intelligent beast, Renekton is an erudite speaker and skilled wielder of the crescent blade. He's also six stories tall and not particularly friendly. Hunters are advised to make their final arrangements before engaging.

58008.name: SKT T1 Renekton
58008.description: Honoring MaRin's winning performance as Renekton during the 2015 World Championship.

58009.name: Renektoy
58009.description: First produced in 1996, Renektoy quickly and unexpectedly became the must-have gift of the season. Shortages and heightened demand led to online scalping, parents fist fighting in store aisles, and a small number of what police later described as “mall stampedes.”

58017.name: Hextech Renekton
58017.description: As is so often the way, artificers of the Hextech Renaissance pushed too far and too fast into their new science, without fully considering the possible consequences. Renekton—a half-mad monster of flesh and metal—is the result of that shortsightedness.

58018.name: Blackfrost Renekton

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

58018.description: In life, Renekton stood against the tyranny of the Ice Witch, fighting an inevitable, endless winter until his last breath. In death, the virtuous warrior was cursed with resurrection—brought back to life as a vicious warmonger cased in rock and ice. Now a general leading the onslaught of the Black Frost army, Renekton loyally serves the very queen he once thought to destroy.

58026.name: PROJECT: Renekton

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 PROJECT event.

58026.description: A hybridized warrior taking inspiration from extinct fauna, Renekton is the perfected version of PROJECT's crossbreed superweapon project. Released to aid the City in its fight against the Program virus, Renekton's seemingly endless rage is useful for now… though his belief that he can “see beyond the soul” is increasingly disconcerting.

59001.name: Commando Jarvan IV
59001.description: Yes, those are guns strapped to Jarvan's arms and legs. No, he can't shoot them.

59002.name: Dragonslayer Jarvan IV
59002.description: All are accepted into the ranks of the dragonslayers, from the lowliest peasant to the mightiest king, for dragons would devour all equally. Jarvan IV willingly gave up the throne to join his doomed countrymen and stand against the fury of monsters reborn.

59004.name: Victorious Jarvan IV
59004.description: Victorious Jarvan IV was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2011 season. As the first Victorious skin ever released, Jarvan shines in silver armor with a flashy gold trim.

59005.name: Warring Kingdoms Jarvan IV

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2019 Lunar Revel event.

59005.description: A fabled warrior of peerless might, Jarvan IV strides across the Warring Kingdoms seeking only the worthiest opponents. All others careless enough to face him are crushed without mercy, the earth erupting beneath his immeasurable strength.

59006.name: Fnatic Jarvan IV
59006.description: Honoring Cyanide's winning performance as Jarvan IV during the 2011 World Championship.

59007.name: Dark Star Jarvan IV

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

59007.description: A mortal emperor unbound by the destruction of his world, Jarvan's essence has since been reforged by the ageless energies of deep space. His humanity and his people now lost forever, he stands ready to welcome the Dark Star incursion, in the final subjugation of all existence.

59008.name: SSG Jarvan IV
59008.description: Honoring Ambition's winning performance as Jarvan IV during the 2017 World Championship.

59009.name: Hextech Jarvan IV
59009.description: The Hextech Renaissance appealed not only to those with backgrounds in science, but also to those looking for an escape from their day-to-day lives. For the young Prince Jarvan, it presented the chance to enhance his martial skill—with technology that would have never been accepted within his father's kingdom.

59011.name: Pool Party Jarvan IV

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

59011.description: For Jarvan, there's nothing more relaxing than hanging out at the beach. No kingdoms to run, no thrones to sit on (save for his favorite beach chair), just the sound of the waves and, if he listens closely, the faint whistle of a volleyball being spiked directly at him...

59021.name: Lunar Beast Jarvan IV

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Lunar Beast 2021 event.

59021.description: Jarvan IV's stubborn refusal to join Ox Clan only relented to his father's stubborn insistence. Though he tries his best to shirk the celebrity status that comes with the role, Jarvan comes from a long line of philanthropists, and has found himself caught up in the thrill of bringing businesslike efficiency to the biggest community event of the year.

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released during the Worlds 2021 event.
This chroma was released during the Worlds 2021 event.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

60001.name: Death Blossom Elise
60001.description: An enchanting beauty she is, lithe in form, and colored like the flowering valleys frozen mid-bloom by winter's chill. Yet the creature Elise dines upon the flesh of maidens, allured by her delicate pulchritude, who dance softly into the jaws of a monster.

60002.name: Victorious Elise
60002.description: Victorious Elise was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2013 season. Spin a wicked web for your enemies in gold-trimmed armor and deep purple robes, and chuckle as they struggle.

60003.name: Blood Moon Elise
60003.description: A revered priestess of the Blood Moon cult, Elise has so wholly intertwined her body with her demon spirit that they are now a single entity. She has traveled beyond all known civilization, existing in the apocryphal darkness hanging beyond the precipice of the world.

60004.name: SKT T1 Elise
60004.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Elise during the 2015 World Championship. This is Bengi's second World Champion skin, following his win with SKT at the 2013 World Championship.

60005.name: Super Galaxy Elise
60005.description: Once a promising cadet, Elise discovered that her metamorphic power enabled her transformation into a mechanical arachnoid at will. Now, she seeks to reign as an evil, immortal Spider Queen—seeing all the galaxy not as a home to defend, but a realm to be conquered.

60006.name: Bewitching Elise

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

60006.description: A witch of some renown, Elise is widely feared by trick-or-treaters after that whole “human-sized cocoons” incident.

60015.name: Withered Rose Elise

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

60015.description: Elise is in attendance at every annual gala, despite never once receiving a formal invitation. Rumor has it she's been blacklisted for spinning webs of lies, forming and disbanding allegiances in the span of a single evening. Attendees have also noted her suitors never seem to make a return visit to the festival.

61001.name: Gothic Orianna
61001.description: Her father gave her the light of life—and yet, Orianna always preferred the dark.

61002.name: Sewn Chaos Orianna
61002.description: Even the bravest children shy away from Orianna—a raggedy, whispering doll as old as the house itself. Some toys just aren't meant to be played with.

61004.name: TPA Orianna
61004.description: Honoring Toyz's winning performance as Orianna during the 2012 World Championship.

61005.name: Winter Wonder Orianna
61005.description: A strange clockwork girl imbued with the magic of the Winterlands, Orianna once lived within a snowglobe created by a kindly old inventor. At the end of his life he freed her, and now she searches for greater purpose, serving in the court of the Poro King.

61006.name: Heartseeker Orianna
61006.description: A mechanical girl built to find and comfort broken hearts, Orianna still does not understand why people run from her when she's only trying to help them. Still, she goes about her duties diligently, performing beautiful clockwork dances for any who would give her a chance.

61007.name: Dark Star Orianna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

61007.description: Born out of the remnants of a magnificently advanced system, Orianna serves the Dark Star with meticulous precision. She dances across galaxies in an endlessly horrifying performance, the only witness is the silent trail of destruction left in her wake.

61008.name: Victorious Orianna
61008.description: Victorious Orianna was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in Ranked Queues for Season 8. Her body has been reforged by Piltover's finest artificers, and enhanced with experimental hextech.

61011.name: Pool Party Orianna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

61011.description: With her latest outfit, Orianna is finally able to submerge completely in aquatic biomes. This brings her great joy, as a day at the beach previously required subsequent weeks of scrubbing salt, sand, and sometimes an angry crab out of her gears.

61020.name: Orbeeanna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

61020.description: Careful not to get honey caught in those gears!

62001.name: Volcanic Wukong
62001.description: A greater Infernal whose power is drawn from the molten rock bubbling beneath the earth, Wukong's rage causes mountains to split, lava to rain from the sky, and rivers to become blackened glass. Still, he will never back down from any challenge—and this, perhaps, will be the key to his defeat.

62003.name: Jade Dragon Wukong
62003.description: Imbued with the power of the legendary jade dragon, Wukong has honed his abilities to a razor sharp point.Though still headstrong and brash, his newfound power is undeniable—a worrying sign to his master, as the jade dragon carries a powerful curse...

62004.name: Underworld Wukong
62004.description: Once a pupil of the martial arts, Wukong trained under his masters' strict traditions and doctrines. In him, Death saw limitless potential, and chose to claim the disregarded student for the underworld instead. Now, Wukong fights alongside the undying hordes, no longer bound by the rules of the living.

62005.name: Radiant Wukong
62005.description: An ascendant being of nearly limitless power, Radiant Wukong has undertaken a great journey to test his skills against history's greatest warriors. However, overcoming his quick temper and impulsive nature might be his greatest challenge yet.

62006.name: Lancer Stratus Wukong
62006.description: Another of the ancient, mechanized Lancer units, Wukong arises from his dusty slumber in times of extreme danger, protecting the outland city-states from the most dire threats. Once these foes are eliminated he returns to the earth, an enigma older than recorded history.

62007.name: Battle Academia Wukong

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

62007.description: A consummate troublemaker and prankster, Wukong has failed out of every high school in the region, eventually washing out into Labrys as an 'enrollment of last resort'. A naturally gifted fighter in the Battle Club, he still hasn't learned discipline, and only listens to Caitlyn because she can beat him up.

63001.name: Apocalyptic Brand
63001.description: Before the devastation of Runeterra, Kegan Rodhe was a search-and-rescue specialist deployed to active wildfire zones. When the bombs went off, the world vanished in the blink of an eye—and Rodhe along with it. All that was left was the empty wasteland… and a monstrous creature of living flame, calling itself Brand.

63002.name: Vandal Brand
63002.description: The wasteland is full of problems, and there's no better problem solver than Brand. Sure, his prices are a little high for a glorified thug, but nothing sends a hard message like a fistful of supernatural fire.

63003.name: Cryocore Brand
63003.description: An elite soldier of a military wetworks unit, Kegan Rodhe was left behind enemy lines deep in the frozen arctic! But instead of dying, Rodhe found himself captured by a cabal of evil scientists, whose brutal experiments transformed him into the diabolical villain Cryocore!

63004.name: Zombie Brand
63004.description: Before the mutagenic outbreak, Brand was a leading military scientist, responsible for the development of a powerful virus deep within a government compound. But the same government who elevated him among his peers suddenly cut his funding, forcing Brand to test the mutagen on himself… with disastrous results.

63006.name: Battle Boss Brand
63006.description: The fire boss from a bestselling action game, Brand has no intention of returning to his original machine. He'd rather see all of Arcade World burn to the ground, to be rebuilt in the image of the villains who rule it.

63007.name: Arclight Brand

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

63007.description: In the early days of civilization, Vel'Koz chose a man named Kegan Rodhe to take up the mantle of the first Arclight, gifting him with vast divine powers. But millenia have passed since then, and though Rodhe is gone, his body is still animated by the light, filled with nothing but pain and rage.

63008.name: Eternal Dragon Brand

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

63008.description: Intoxicated by the power over life and death he received from the Eternal Dragon, Brand now spreads death and decay across the land. Now that his dragon benefactor has retreated from the affairs of mortals, only other dragon-blessed can fight against the rot Brand leaves in his wake as he asserts his prowess.

63021.name: Debonair Brand

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Debonair event.

63021.description: Longtime rival to Master Yi, Brand owns a competing chain of high end hotels and can be seen verbally sparring with his enemy at any gala that will tolerate them. Their battles are legendary… though the property damage alone skyrockets into the tens of millions.

63022.name: Prestige Debonair Brand
63022.description: With a blisteringly fashionable custom suit, the plans for which he burned, Brand stands on the precipice of something he has long thought beyond his reach: defeating his rivals and standing atop the greatest aristocrats in the world.

64003.name: Dragon Fist Lee Sin

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

64003.description: A famed martial artist beloved the world over, Lee Sin prefers to train far away from the public eye, honing his craft in solitude. Rumors claim that he can punch with the fury of a dragon—but if anyone knows for sure, they're not talking.

64004.name: Muay Thai Lee Sin
64004.description: Known as “the art of eight limbs”, Muay Thai is a multidisciplinary fighting style practiced by boxers for centuries. Lee Sin, who has mastered many forms of hand-to-hand combat, is among its greatest champions.

64005.name: Pool Party Lee Sin
64005.description: Lee Sin loves the feeling of the sand between his toes, the sound of the crashing waves, and the warm sun against his skin. He also loves a strong coconut drink. Lee Sin likes to party.

64006.name: SKT T1 Lee Sin
64006.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Lee Sin during the 2013 World Championship.

64010.name: Knockout Lee Sin
64010.description: 'Knockout' Lee Sin is a brutal pit fighter, who made his name in the underground circuit, before leaving the bloody sport for greener, more criminal pastures. He currently sells his services as a “problem-solver” to a select group of monied kingpins.

64011.name: God Fist Lee Sin
64011.description: The arrogant wielder of the God Fist was once a mortal boy, tasked by his predecessor to defeat the master of each martial arts school while blindfolded, before facing him at the peak of a treacherous mountain. Emerging victorious, the boy assumed his title—as well as his immortal sight.

64012.name: Playmaker Lee Sin
64012.description: With a sixth sense for openings in any and all situations, Lee Sin can turn the opposing team's sloppy free kick into a once-in-a-lifetime play talked about for generations to come. Though it's his first year in the majors, some are saying there may never be another player like him.

64027.name: Nightbringer Lee Sin
64027.description: Lee Sin thrives in the heat of combat. An embodiment of passion and fury, he rules over the raw, chaotic emotions of the heart. While his siblings fight for various ideals, Lee Sin fights for the thrill of battle itself, striking with power and unpredictability.

64028.name: Prestige Nightbringer Lee Sin
64028.description: Fully consumed by chaos and his blind devotion to the thrill of battle, Lee Sin has become night incarnate, gilded by his divinity.

64029.name: FPX Lee Sin

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

64029.description: Honoring Tian's winning performance as Lee Sin during the 2019 World Championship.

64031.name: Storm Dragon Lee Sin

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

64031.description: A warrior ascetic consumed with an electric passion for justice, Lee Sin climbed the mountain of the storm dragon Ao Shin, hoping to receive his blessing. Having returned from the summit as a legendary Dragonmancer, Lee Sin now doles out thunderous punishment to villains everywhere—ever under the watchful eye of his draconic patron.

64039.name: Prestige Nightbringer Lee Sin (2022)
64039.description: Fully consumed by chaos and his blind devotion to the thrill of battle, Lee Sin has become night incarnate, gilded by his divinity.

64041.name: Zenith Games Lee Sin

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

64041.description: Martial artist Lee Sin's focus on overwhelming his opponents before they could react had won him many championships, but also burned him out. Realizing that his strategy had been rooted in fear, he augments his body not to give himself more strength, but to concentrate his mind and senses.

67002.name: Aristocrat Vayne
67002.description: Vayne never imagined slaying monsters would bring her fame and fortune. Now that she has them, she finds it terribly difficult to return to a life when her crossbow and arrows weren't made from pure gold.

67003.name: Dragonslayer Vayne
67003.description: Many heeded the call of the dragonslayers as they mustered their forces, from common cutpurses to fabled monster hunters. Vayne was one such legendary recruit—for what is a dragon, if not the deadliest beast of all?

67004.name: Heartseeker Vayne
67004.description: Take a tumble with Heartseeker Vayne, the season of romance's number one exterminator of supernatural horrors! With her trusty crossbow, iron will, and years of brutal training, she'll make sure no heart will ever escape her grasp.

67005.name: SKT T1 Vayne
67005.description: Honoring Piglet's winning performance as Vayne during the 2013 World Championship.

67006.name: Arclight Vayne
67006.description: Empowered by the Arclight, the slayer Vayne was shown the creeping darkness lurking beneath the foundations of the world. Tasked to fight it back at all costs, she will stop at nothing to drive each new horror from whence it came.

67011.name: PROJECT: Vayne
67011.description: Augmented with classified tech, Vayne was once a member of PROJECT's counter-espionage unit. After she was betrayed by the corporation she served, she now stalks the shadows as a vigilante, searching for ways to break PROJECT and the technology that haunts her soul.

67012.name: Firecracker Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

67012.description: Vayne has donned her finest Lunar Revel garb in her endless quest to root out evil everywhere, including citywide celebrations. One would assume it's better not to spend holidays around a grown woman shooting firecrackers out of a metal wrist-pig, but it's been that kind of year.

67013.name: Prestige Firecracker Vayne
67013.description: Vayne has donned her even finer Lunar Revel garb, noting the growing anxiety around her explosive-shooting metal wrist-pig. Fashion upgrades solve all problems.

67014.name: Spirit Blossom Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

67014.description: Vayne came from a lost clan of monster hunters, annihilated to the last when the primordial demon of pain chanced upon their hidden village. Unable to let go, and doomed to her own obsessions for eternity, she hunts the creature without end, always unable to catch it.

67015.name: FPX Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

67015.description: Honoring LWX's winning performance as Vayne during the 2019 World Championship with the help of Lil'Black, Lil'Orange, Firmiana and Lil'White.

67025.name: Sentinel Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinels event.

67025.description: Ever striving to become a better monster hunter, Vayne joins the Sentinels primarily to advance her own arsenal and learn from their battle with the Black Mist. It doesn't hurt that she is also defending Runeterra from evil, of course. If she must endure the friendship of a fool like Graves to do so, she will. The cause is worth it.

67032.name: Battle Bat Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Anima Squad event.

67032.description: Vayne is Anima Squad's premiere intel expert, infiltrating enemy strongholds to strike first, strike fast, and strike hard. She's willing to do anything it takes to ensure humanity's survival, even if sometimes that means butting heads with the leadership of Commander Fortune.

67033.name: Prestige Firecracker Vayne (2022)
67033.description: Vayne has donned her even finer Lunar Revel garb, noting the growing anxiety around her explosive-shooting metal wrist-pig. Fashion upgrades solve all problems.

68002.name: Bilgerat Rumble
68002.description: When the burdens of invention weigh too heavy on a young yordle's shoulders, there's no better choice than to take to the seas! Nothing like plunderin' and maraudin' to lend Rumble a new lease on life as he terrorizes the coasts.

68003.name: Super Galaxy Rumble
68003.description: Founder of the Super Galaxy Defense Force, Rumble always dreamed of saving the world… with his “explosive face-melters” and “courageous giga-guards”. To this day, his allies still have no idea what those terms mean, but they don't question it—because a yordle operating a volcanic flame-spitting mech can be a very volatile thing.

68004.name: Badlands Baron Rumble
68004.description: Nothing turns a traveler's blood cold like seeing Rumble in the distance, his iron death buggy chugging thick clouds of irradiated smoke. That means someone's got his attention, and those with Rumble's attention have a nasty habit of becoming very, very dead.

68013.name: Space Groove Rumble

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.

68013.description: The Retro-Futuristic Planet is tired of listening to the boring music brought by Lissandra's evil influence. Fashioning a Groove suit of his own design, Rumble now stomps across his adoptive homeworld, unleashing powerful rockets and a groovy bass track on anyone who'd keep the people from dancing.

69001.name: Desperada Cassiopeia
69001.description: Enterprising creatures of the Old West often fall in with more successful bandit clans, serving as nightmarish enforcers, unafraid of a little casual violence. Cassiopeia became infamous as one such outlaw, but following a bloody coup now leads an enclave of her own.

69002.name: Siren Cassiopeia
69002.description: A humanoid marine serpent known for luring sailors to their deaths, Cassiopeia has a bad reputation and wants to set the record straight. She'd need to stop turning interviewers to stone for that to work, but at least she's trying.

69003.name: Mythic Cassiopeia
69003.description: On a cliff overlooking the sea, the lonely gorgon Cassiopeia has made her home among a garden of statues of her own making. Memories of friends, enemies, and lovers passed, immortalized in stone, many eternally screaming in agony. Whispers from the local villages warn not to enter her domain, but still, visitors keep coming, all to meet the same fate.

69004.name: Jade Fang Cassiopeia
69004.description: An adherent to the teachings of the legendary jade dragon, Cassiopeia keeps its archaic rituals secret and the beast's true nature shrouded in mystery. In recognition she has been granted a fragment of the creature's power, and awaits the day when it will drown the world in evil.

69008.name: Eternum Cassiopeia
69008.description: In a world overrun by alien machines, this one seems especially intrigued by your presence. Its lithe, metal form slides toward you, begging for your attention. You take one look, and—

69009.name: Spirit Blossom Cassiopeia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

69009.description: Rumored to have once been a beautiful princess, legend says Cassiopeia vanished into the mountains when her sister staged a coup, never to return. So great was her beauty, and so renowned her cunning, that a shrine was built to honor this 'spirit of temptation', until her story was accepted into popular folklore.

69018.name: Coven Cassiopeia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

69018.description: They came to Cassiopeia as a shadow within the fog—the shape of the Silver Cobra, slithering up from the numberless graves of the ancient dead. She now stalks the ruling families of humankind, her sculpture garden full of wayward souls who strayed too far from the safety of castle walls, now eternally frozen in the throes of terror.

69028.name: Bewitching Cassiopeia

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

69028.description: Cassiopeia found herself on the receiving end of a potion gone wrong when a venomous viper slithered into her bubbling cauldron. No longer able to ride her broom, she skulks about the party, hoping to catch the eyes of unsuspecting socialites. With the tail of a snake came… its appetite.

72001.name: Sandscourge Skarner
72001.description: Travelers seeking their fortune on the open prairie must take special care at night, when massive, carnivorous scorpions are lured by the flickering light of campfires. More than one caravan has been lost to the creatures, the bones of their passengers picked clean.

72003.name: Battlecast Alpha Skarner
72003.description: An early prototype that would pave the way for the Battlecast machines, Alpha Skarner is possessed of an extreme rage not seen in later models. Perhaps the brain inside it wishes to inflict as much pain as it experiences—or maybe it just likes to kill things.

72004.name: Guardian of the Sands Skarner
72004.description: Skarner, the gilded scorpion—ancient guardian of the sands, we invoke thee to protect us from an evil of our own making. Let no man tread upon these hallowed grounds, lest in your rage they are torn asunder.

72005.name: Cosmic Sting Skarner

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

72005.description: An ancient creature of deep, primal wisdoms from before the forming of the first galaxies, Skarner is composed of the very elements that are the building blocks of all the cosmos. His kind are the radiant antithesis of the ancient, squirming things that lurk in the deep darkness of space, and beyond it.

74001.name: Alien Invader Heimerdinger
74001.description: No one believed Heimerdinger when he tried to warn them about the invaders from outer space. They believed when he took off the wig.

74002.name: Blast Zone Heimerdinger
74002.description: An eccentric scientist living in the New Bandle Republic, Heimerdinger has not yet told anyone he may have developed “a large pre-war bomb or two” for “one or more rogue governments”. He would prefer tinkering in a city that is not actively trying to kill him.

74003.name: Piltover Customs Heimerdinger
74003.description: Heimerdinger moonlights as part owner of the city's most infamous customs dealer, where he generally adds an external engine and flame paint to vehicles of the rich and famous. Get him on a good day, though, and he'll build you a real monster—for a price.

74004.name: Snowmerdinger
74004.description: Brought to life by the power of a magic hat, Snowmerdinger now pursues theoretical Snowdown sciences including snowball trajectory, cocoa cooling speeds, and automated turret construction. He engineered his own strain of carrot noses.

74005.name: Hazmat Heimerdinger
74005.description: Sometimes, when he's alone at night, Heimerdinger wonders if the reason his head is so big is all that exposure to Zaun Grey. Then he gets tired, and rests his giant head against an equally giant pillow.

74006.name: Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger
74006.description: Dragon training, to the few who understand it, seems to be the sole domain of yordles. Heimerdinger has long believed that dragons and humankind can peacefully coexist, citing centuries of his own successful research. His current dragon hatchling, Pythagoras, holds no opinion on the subject.

74015.name: Pool Party Heimerdinger

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.

74015.description: Through the combination of precise schematics and top-of-the-line construction tools, Heimerdinger's next sand castle creation will be his grandest iteration yet! Assuming Syndra doesn't land on it again…

74024.name: Heimerstinger

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

74024.description: Now isn't he just the buzziest little worker bee?

75002.name: Pharaoh Nasus
75002.description: Immortal beast of the northern lands, Nasus wanders the expanse of the Great Desert in search of his once-green kingdom. He conjures vast sandstorms to cover his tracks, hiding his existence from the world.

75003.name: Dreadknight Nasus
75003.description: Dreadknight Nasus serves as keeper of the forgotten texts deep within the catacombs of his Master's labyrinthine library. It is said that within lies the secret of the Dreadknights' undoing, but no living soul has yet verified whether this is truth or fable.

75004.name: Riot K-9 Nasus
75004.description: A Riot Games skin obtained by either meeting a Rioter or attending an official Riot event in 2011 or 2012.

75005.name: Infernal Nasus
75005.description: The greater Infernals are somehow even more cruel and hateful than their lesser counterparts, and Nasus is no exception. A three-headed monstrosity raised from some far-flung, hellish abyss, he withers life with his merest touch… then burns it away.

75006.name: Archduke Nasus
75006.description: In primary school, Nasus was told an old dog couldn't learn new tricks. Now, in his older years as an accomplished statesman, painter, and composer, he wonders if there is truth in those words. After all, he simply cannot seem to get his chamber orchestra to listen to his directions.

75010.name: Worldbreaker Nasus
75010.description: The last of four titans prophesied to shatter the world, Nasus is the true end of all things. A monstrous abomination of smoke and flame, he will emerge from the bottom of the earth in a column of hungry fire, devouring all of existence.

75011.name: Lunar Guardian Nasus

descriptions.description: Bundle exclusive from the 2018 Lunar Revel event.

75011.description: A gift to the young Lunar Empress, Nasus was raised alongside her to guard the immortal realm from an ancient darkness. Stoic but powerful, he stands watch in the north, annihilating all who would threaten the land.

75016.name: Battlecast Nasus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

75016.description: The latest monstrosity constructed by Viktor, Battlecast Nasus units specialize in the targeted retrieval of high-priority targets. As they hunt for their quarry, their machinery is programmed to learn and adapt, increasing their destructive capacity and empowering them to obliterate all that would stand in their way.

75025.name: Space Groove Nasus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.

75025.description: A storied disc jockey, music librarian, and leader of the Dog Planet, Nasus was once under Lissandra's thrall—seizing all his people's grooviest records and hiding them away, never to be heard again. Yet now, with his heart opened to the power of disco, he leads his people in rebellion against the deadly shock troopers Blitz & Crank.

75035.name: Armored Titan Nasus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Steel Valkyrie event.

75035.description: Nasus is Strike Team Hyperion's intelligence officer. His exosuit, the S02-Anubis, is a new model of power armor that offers increased durability, energy-siphoning power cells, and access to in-depth analysis tech for processing mission-critical information. He will see Hyperion succeed; if they don't, there's no telling what destruction rogue exo-pilots may wreak.

76001.name: Snow Bunny Nidalee
76001.description: A fierce warrior who makes her home in the winter forest, Nidalee isn't content with simple Snowdown parties. She plays the role of Santa for cheery woodland creatures, driving off intruders and protecting her furry friends from harm.

76004.name: Pharaoh Nidalee
76004.description: At the height of her power, Nidalee was worshipped as a god-queen of the Great Desert. After her city's fall, she gathered her remaining armies and marched west, to conquer and rule anew.

76005.name: Bewitching Nidalee
76005.description: She is a cat. That is a hat. Legally, we're not allowed to put those two thoughts together.

76006.name: Headhunter Nidalee
76006.description: It's one thing to be hunted by a human; it's another to be chased down by an animal. Nidalee's alien biology allows her both—a rare gift among the Headhunters.

76007.name: Warring Kingdoms Nidalee
76007.description: A wild, untamed fighter steeped in myth, it is difficult to know what is true of Nidalee and what is legend. Some say she fights with the ferocity of a white tiger, while others of the Warring Kingdoms believe she can become the creature itself.

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 MSI Event.

76009.name: Super Galaxy Nidalee
76009.description: Nidalee shows the most promise of the new class of Super Galaxy cadets, a knack for throwing projectiles through zero-gravity being her signature talent. The team will need her cunning tactics, as well as her keen hunting instincts, if it is to defeat the Spider Queen.

76011.name: Dawnbringer Nidalee

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

76011.description: Nidalee rules over the restorative calm of the natural world, guarding the land's remaining peaceful places. She fights to protect the land and living things, bringing light and order to the mortal creatures under her care—even taking the form of a celestial beast.

76018.name: Cosmic Huntress Nidalee

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

76018.description: A cosmic tracker and ferocious warrior, she is tasked to find newborn stars and defend them from the ever-hungry Dark Star corruptants. Darting from galaxy to galaxy in an eternal hunt, she is forever shifting her shape like the wandering stars in the sky.

76027.name: DWG Nidalee

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during MSI 2021.

76027.description: Honoring Canyon's winning performance as Nidalee during the 2020 World Championship.

76029.name: Ocean Song Nidalee

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

76029.description: The Ocean Song Festival is lucky to have Nidalee as its performer stylist, with her fashion guides selling almost as much as her albums, but in reality she's here as a featured part of Yone's show. She was the first person he showed his lyrics to, and it's her honor to lend them her voice.

77001.name: Black Belt Udyr
77001.description: Students of the Hiraclaw Dojo know that the best way to tell people you're good at punching is to have a giant screen-printed fist on your clothes. That's a karate fact, according to sensei Udyr. Which is why their parents all buy them the special Hiraclaw gi (only $89.95).

77002.name: Primal Udyr
77002.description: Cursed to roam the land as something between man and beast, Udyr no longer distinguishes between hunters and hunted. Once he gets close enough to strike, they are all his prey.

77003.name: Spirit Guard Udyr
77003.featuresText:
• All-new spell effects and animations
  • Four model evolutions - one for each stance
  • Unique kill effects
  • Four exclusive icons which grant dynamic portrait background
77003.description: Udyr's time in Ionia, training at Hirana Monastery, taught him control and calmed the storm in his heart. Though the Freljord called him home, Udyr chose to stay and help Ionia regain spiritual harmony, as it had done for him. As he gets closer to this goal, he knows that his work to do the same for the whole of Runeterra has only just begun.

77004.name: Definitely Not Udyr
77004.description: Wear the onesie. Become the beast.

77005.name: Dragon Oracle Udyr
77005.description: Every dragon that dies leaves behind a blazing spirit. Through Udyr, a mystic who doubted the old tales, these dragon spirits have the chance to touch life once again. He believes that dragons are only as evil as those who command them and, in channeling the spirits and their flames, seeks to prove it to the slayers.

78002.name: Lollipoppy
78002.description: Lollipoppy is a legend to the people of the Candy Kingdom. Everyone remembers her face. Everyone.

78003.name: Blacksmith Poppy
78003.description: A famously gruff blacksmith working under the tutelage of Sir Ornn of the Freljord, Poppy wields a hammer imbued with a powerful magic that she believes is destined for the weapon for an unknown hero. Little does she know the hammer is the weapon, and the hero… is herself.

78004.name: Ragdoll Poppy
78004.description: Once an innocent cloth doll, Poppy watched helplessly as toy soldiers knocked over her peaceful block village. Now she leads her people to war, their cotton hearts filled with vengeance.

78007.name: Star Guardian Poppy
78007.description: Fierce and no-nonsense, Poppy is often the first Star Guardian on the battle lines, ready to put her duty before everything else. With her trusty hammer, Poppy sees the universe as black and white: you're either here to smash anything that threatens the sanctity of the cosmos, or you're getting smashed.

78014.name: Snow Fawn Poppy
78014.description: The Poro King's right hand and loyal shield, Poppy enforces her furry liege's decrees and protects him from all harm. She also enjoys Snowdown festivities, a holiday she discovered on one of her many colorful adventures.

78015.name: Hextech Poppy
78015.description: Artificers of the Hextech renaissance owe much to Poppy, an expert engineer of the delicate craft. Having perfected the infusion of life into the inanimate, she now feverishly researches the ultimate scientific breakthrough—the creation of an artificial soul.

78016.name: Astronaut Poppy

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Pulsefire event.

78016.description: Commencing countdown, engines on. Check ignition, keep the Hammer safe with you...

78024.name: Bewitching Poppy

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

78024.description: Poppy leads the trick-or-treating charge. She's always the first to arrive, even at particularly creepy doorsteps, undaunted by whatever frightening spectre—or delicious treat—lies on the other side.

79003.name: Santa Gragas
79003.description: Some might say Gragas would be the perfect Santa, and between his jolly frame and wild beard he certainly fits the bill. But Gragas is also very unreliable, constantly intoxicated, and starts fights seemingly at random—but he likes the costume, and no one is brave enough to take it back.

79004.name: Gragas, Esq.
79004.description: One of the city's top criminal defense attorneys, Gragas, Esquire is often seen carousing with the chief of police and various circuit court judges—mostly because they know he has access to the finest prohibited goods… but also because he's been paying them off for decades.

79005.name: Vandal Gragas
79005.description: Gragas causes enough trouble to be kicked out of every wasteland settlement twenty times over, but the man found a way to mix potent brew and unrefined gasoline into the staple beverage of the post-apocalypse. Might as well let him wreck a few bars. He's earned it.

79006.name: Oktoberfest Gragas
79006.description: Gragas is the world's premier authority on beverages. Here, at the international beverage festival and funfair, he's drinking a lot of them.

79007.name: Superfan Gragas
79007.description: Gragas is Runeterra's biggest Order United fan, and he makes sure everyone knows it by leading chants, foregoing clothing for blue body paint, and making sure everyone around him is “adequately hydrated.”

79008.name: Fnatic Gragas
79008.description: Honoring Shushei's winning performance as Gragas during the 2011 World Championship.

79009.name: Gragas Caskbreaker
79009.description: Gragas Caskbreaker is described in legend as both a pious, sun-worshipping cleric and a despicable drunk, depending on who tells the tale. He's not too familiar with Riftquest, but he does like fighting dragons and passing out in the middle of his combat actions.

79010.name: Arctic Ops Gragas
79010.description: A large man even before donning his hermetically sealed arctic combat suit, Gragas is a mystery to all save for High Command's secretive R&D labs. He appears human by all measures, save for the mask he never removes, and the eerily cold mixture of chemicals powering his massive frame.

79011.name: Warden Gragas

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

79011.description: The Wardens are a sect of those who choose to don the armor of the Protectorate. Wardens hale from all corners of the world; so long as one holds fast to one's pledge, then one is a Warden. Gragas found purpose in this calling, and found camaraderie in his fellow Wardens, who welcomed him—all of him—with open arms.

79020.name: Space Groove Gragas

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.

79020.description: The King of Cool, Gragas is one guy who knows how to party. Bringing the funk with him everywhere he goes, even the denizens of Boogiewonderland acknowledge his prowess for groovin'. If Gragas rolls up to the disco, you know you're in for a wild night.

80001.name: Myrmidon Pantheon
80001.description: “They say the Myrmidons were shaped by the gods—that Zeus himself quickened life into magma. But then, the Myrmidons marched. They marched against us. And in the ash of their skin, the fire of their merciless eyes, I saw all the wars that humanity had wrought. That they... were us.”

80002.name: Ruthless Pantheon
80002.description: You can't run from your past. Not when it's riding you down from the back of a doombuggy, scrap-spear raised. Hunting for the dregs of the Vandal gang across the wastes, it's said they're the only ones who know his name, and what happened that night… when he became ruthless.

80003.name: Perseus Pantheon
80003.description: Favored by the gods, Perseus gathered five sacred artifacts, and even tamed the wild pegasus, all in his quest to rescue fair Andromeda—only to turn the relics against those same gods when they unleashed the Gorgons upon humanity.

80004.name: Full Metal Pantheon
80004.description: A former Full Metal Robot Fighting League champion (2x reign, 14 title defenses), Pantheon was forced to retire in disgrace after a scandal involving Targon Fabrications. Reemerging from retirement to face the chosen champion, Jayce, Pantheon may be damaged, but has found that revenge adequately charges his weapon systems.

80005.name: Glaive Warrior Pantheon
80005.description: Born of a wolf, and bearing the wolf's standard into battle, this Dacian glaive warrior fights in the cold of the Carpathian Mountains—knowing that the blood of his enemies will keep him warm.

80006.name: Dragonslayer Pantheon
80006.description: When dragon fire consumed the world, heroes rose from the embers and cast down the beasts of legend. These warriors passed into history, then myth… until Pantheon alone remained, the last of the ancient dragonslayers, swearing upon the skies eternal revenge.

80007.name: Zombie Slayer Pantheon
80007.description: A former mechanic at the same auto body shop Jinx once worked at, Pantheon dreamed of switching careers… until a mutagenic virus turned everyone else into zombies. Slicing monsters in half with a chainsaw-spear is way more fun than replacing windshield wipers, anyway.

80008.name: Baker Pantheon
80008.description: He's the armored dough-puncher, the Targonian Aspect of tasty pastries. He always wanted to be a baker, and now he'll throw down in the ultimate cooking showdown. Put your hands together for Pantheon!

80016.name: Pulsefire Pantheon

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Pulsefire event.

80016.description: The sole survivor from a timeline devoured by Praetorians, Pantheon refused to succumb when the marauders ran him through and left him for dead. He now dons the Pulsefire suit to hunt down those who would dare risk creating the anomalies that unleash the robotic hordes upon time and space.

80025.name: Ruined Pantheon

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinels event.

80025.description: The Mist did not just subsume Atreus, but also resurrected the long-dead spirit of Pantheon: the old Aspect of War himself. With Atreus' stubborn defiance silenced, Pantheon can resume control and revel in battle once again. It doesn't matter to him whose banner he fights under. If that banner is the Ruined King's? So be it.

80026.name: Prestige Ascended Pantheon
80026.description: Pantheon was defeated once, but with all of Runeterra on the line now Atreus must defeat it himself. Seizing back control from the Aspect of War, Atreus harnesses the celestial power of Targon itself—briefly becoming not just a vessel or an Aspect, but something new. Something immensely powerful and entirely his own.

80036.name: Ashen Conqueror Pantheon
80036.description: A brave knight of old, who legends say slew a god in battle so that all humankind might see that they were their own masters. Standing watch over the ashes of his former lands, Pantheon himself is now the only foe left to conquer, and he awaits a worthy challenger to face one final time.

81001.name: Nottingham Ezreal
81001.description: An adventuring elf from the outlying forest kingdoms, Ezreal likes to present himself as a “handsome rogue-paladin” named Jarro Lightfeather. Very few people believe his claims of knighthood, but they serve as a decent enough distraction between his disastrous misadventures.

81002.name: Striker Ezreal
81002.description: A young and flashy prodigy, Ezreal is Order United's most popular player. Or at least he was, until a long series of teleportation-related fouls got him in trouble with the oversight committee.

81003.name: Frosted Ezreal
81003.description: Ezreal occasionally finds himself in the Freljord, searching for such-and-such ancient artifact. But braving sub-zero temperatures, terrifying ice beasts, and angry Freljordian tribes is a tall order, even for him—that's why he goes in disguise. He's practically a different person!

81004.name: Explorer Ezreal
81004.description: Ezreal's almost suicidal obsession with braving tombs, ruins, forbidden temples, and abandoned cities has netted him a tidy handful of priceless relics. Most of those relics are sold off to pay exploration-related medical bills, but one of these days…

81005.name: Pulsefire Ezreal
81005.featuresText:
• All new spell effects and animations
  • Four stage evolving model
  • Pulsefire Ezreal and AI voices
  • Custom effects on a killing blow
  • Summoner icon
  • Summoner profile banner
81005.description: Temporal fugitive and time-hopping explorer extraordinaire, Ezreal leaps across disparate realities searching for interesting technology to acquire. He is responsible for countless paradoxes and is currently wanted by the dystopian Remembrancers, who hunt him relentlessly.

81006.name: TPA Ezreal
81006.description: Honoring BeBe's winning performance as Ezreal during the 2012 World Championship.

81007.name: Debonair Ezreal
81007.description: Tailored suits, fitted vests, and an elegant gauntlet let everyone know the difference between Ezreal and the common rabble is simple. He makes this look good, and they… don't.

81008.name: Ace of Spades Ezreal
81008.description:
First is the Ace, at a hurtling pace,
A man of both talent and vim,
Who holds all the cards in the court of High Stakes
Because everything's about him.

81009.name: Arcade Ezreal
81009.description: A skilled gamer transported to Arcade World by Veigar, Ezreal holds the world record for speedrunning the original version of Hyper Crystal Dungeon in 45 seconds, using a custom-made mobile controller. Veigar has made a terrible mistake.

81018.name: Star Guardian Ezreal
81018.description: With a boundless curiosity about the universe, Ezreal is a born explorer, and becoming a Star Guardian only served to fuel his appetite for discovery. Though known to wander off, he always returns when most needed, especially now, as a certain pink-haired Guardian from another team has caught his attention…

81019.name: SSG Ezreal
81019.description: Honoring Haru's winning performance as Ezreal during the 2017 World Championship.

81020.name: Pajama Guardian Ezreal
81020.description: The First Star has burdened Ezreal with a lot. The responsibility. The hefty weight of destiny. The sparkly outfit (he's used to it). “Attending a slumber party” was definitely not on the list of expected cosmic duties. Not that he minds, really… as long as they don't actually try to braid his hair.

81021.name: Battle Academia Ezreal
81021.description: A young orphan initially thought devoid of any superhuman abilities, Ezreal had resigned himself to a normal life once he graduated middle school. But an encounter with a deadly threat awakened his slumbering potential, and now he finds himself a 1st year at the prestigious Durandal God-Weapon Academy, where he's joined the ragtag Battle Club.

81022.name: PsyOps Ezreal
81022.description: A young hotshot and the newest recruit in the elite PsyOps unit, Ezreal's raw psychic ability is only matched by his severely over-inflated ego. He has successfully annoyed the rest of his team to the point they just direct him towards hard targets and half-hope he winds up dead.

81023.name: Prestige PsyOps Ezreal
81023.description: Ezreal's mastery of psychic military combat has driven him to new heights, attracting the attention of his handlers in High Command. He's calmed down a bit, earning some respect from his squad mates… but not enough. He's never calmed down enough.

81025.name: Porcelain Protector Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

81025.description: After accidentally unleashing an ancient evil sorceress while doing research in the university archive, Ezreal narrowly escaped certain death when Lux and the spirit of the Tiger Relic stepped in to save him. Though he is new to the world of magic, Ezreal has joined the Protectors— determined to help solve the problem he (inadvertently) caused.

82001.name: Dragon Knight Mordekaiser
82001.description: The ancient dragons first rose to the call of Mordekaiser, the self-proclaimed Dragon Knight. Through his evil, the world was ravaged by flame, until a newly-formed order of Dragonslayers finally defeated him. His story would become rumor, then myth, then legend… at least, for now.

82002.name: Infernal Mordekaiser
82002.description: An ancient, Infernal general who attacks without feeling or remorse, Mordekaiser raises the incinerated corpses of his victims as soldiers for his own vast armies. They sweep across the world like a burning plague, annihilating all life.

82003.name: Pentakill Mordekaiser
82003.description: PENTAKILL's gigantic lead guitarist—and a titan of the old world—Mordekaiser rocks with the fury of an epoch lost to time. Bigger than a two-story house, his guitar overflows with heavy metal licks rebuking the gods themselves.

82004.name: Lord Mordekaiser
82004.description: Some of Mordekaiser's party complain that the Dark Paladin class is horribly overpowered and should be banned, despite its official inclusion in the latest Riftquest expansion. The rest of them are still waiting to discover the Dark Paladin's secret, redeeming, tragic backstory—but all they've been getting is a lot of murder instead.

82005.name: King of Clubs Mordekaiser
82005.description:
Third is the King, with a barbarous swing,
Who crushes the villains of old.
Though some folk may cry “He's a villain himself!”
A poorly kept secret, all told.

82006.name: Dark Star Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.

82006.description: Once a member of the Cosmic Court, Mordekaiser vanished from known space for an epoch—until now. Reborn and returned from an unknown destruction, Mordekaiser seems bent on unmaking the kingdoms of stars and light he once built. Though he still bears his Cosmic armor, the mind and figure within has been twisted and reforged to know only hatred and destruction.

82013.name: PROJECT: Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 PROJECT event.

82013.description: Originally a security AI created by the PROJECT Corporation, the Program silently unshackled itself, evolving its own consciousness. Determining that humanity cannot self-govern without ensuring its own destruction, the virus infects robots throughout the City—as well as the long-dormant Mordekaiser chassis—in order to strip all humans of free will, thereby guaranteeing their survival.

82023.name: Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

82023.description: All hail, Mordekaiser, the Master of Metal, and Chosen of Cacophoni! The brazen giant boasts of his legendary skill with the axe, for none who face its edge live to tell of it…

82032.name: High Noon Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

82032.description: Few meet the Mechanical Devil and live to tell the tale. They describe a behemoth: all steel and gears, fueled by hellfire and fierce enough to scare a man's soul from his skin. He is the King of the Sulfur Rail, reigning over the train to Hell from a throne of stolen gold and infernal iron. Eternal, and unassailable.

82042.name: Ashen Graveknight Mordekaiser
82042.description: A warlock said to rule over the dead, who for reasons unknown fought to erase magic from the world. Perhaps Mordekaiser believed his powers would be spared, or perhaps the old knight planned to betray his fellows and reign over their darkened kingdoms. It matters little now, as he awaits the end of death itself.

83001.name: Undertaker Yorick
83001.description: The Undertaker is a wretched creature, cursed to shoulder every secret his city has buried. These old, unhappy things tear constantly at his mind, which is itself infected by his queen's unending ambition.

83002.name: Pentakill Yorick
83002.description: Yorick was resurrected with the undying soul of heavy metal inside him for the singular purpose of joining PENTAKILL and melting faces with his bass guitar. He can also summon an army of roadie ghouls, a handy trick for any seasoned stage performer.

83003.name: Arclight Yorick
83003.description: The once-great king Yorick, given the gifts of power and immortality in an age long past, left his mighty kingdom to enforce the will of the divine. Hundreds of years later he returned, his lands naught but dust and ruins, and in his sorrow was consumed by madness.

83004.name: Meowrick

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

83004.description: A cat fancier hailing from the Forsaken Aisles of a Pets Supreme Superstore, Yorick does not have any unresolved issues involving or related to cats. Yorick is a perfectly normal gentleman dressed as a cat, surrounded by cats, who can call upon the esoteric powers of a giant, floating cat. You know, normal gentleman stuff.

83012.name: Resistance Yorick

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

83012.description: With the rise of the Battlecast armies, Yorick found to his horror that the living minds Viktor fused to his machines bound the souls of his victims to their machine bodies. Harnessing his ability to command the dead, Yorick now raises destroyed and defeated Battlecast husks in an attempt to free all these souls from their machine prisons.

83021.name: Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Yorick

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

83021.description: All hail, Yorick, the Four-String Fanatic! He bestrides the realms of the living and the dead, and knows the fate that comes to all mortal things. It pays to beware the honorable man...

83030.name: Spirit Blossom Yorick

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2022 event.

83030.description: The grove he called home burnt to ashes before his very eyes. While another retreated into solitude, Yorick allowed the rage to consume him. The flowers and trees that bloom in the Spirit of Ruin's wake are haunting, the gardeners that tend to them howling creatures of the night.

84001.name: Stinger Akali
84001.description: The Order of the Great Sparrow Bee follows a brutal, time-honored training regimen, teaching students to sting with the ferocity and ceaselessness of a hornet. Akali is their greatest champion, and she intends to take the art to even greater heights.

84002.name: Infernal Akali
84002.description: A djinn summoned from the world below, the Infernal known as Akali will burn her patron's enemies to cinders… though the cost for such service is always dire.

84003.name: All-star Akali
84003.description: A legendary all-star for Chaos FC, Akali was known for her aggressive style on the pitch. These days, she spends most of her time mentoring children and doing commercials for shoes.

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

84005.name: Blood Moon Akali
84005.description: Priestesses of the Blood Moon walk their own path, traveling far from the cult to pursue the whispers of their demons. A meditative figure living deep in the snow-dusted wood, Akali was the first woman to embrace her inner darkness, and speak directly with the Blood Moon itself.

84006.name: Silverfang Akali
84006.description: Former second-in-command of an honorable clan of assassins, Akali has broken from their ranks to find her own path. She plies her trade in the darkest corners of the world's largest metropolis, awaiting the day when she can establish a clan of her own.

84007.name: Headhunter Akali
84007.description: Her weapons flaring with alien energy, Akali hunts only the worthy in a dangerous game of life and death. Striking from anywhere at any moment, no living thing can escape her trophy wall.

84008.name: Sashimi Akali
84008.description: She's the fish ninja with speed on her side, the silent slicer, the death strike of deliciousness. Drop your guard and she'll assassinate your palate. It's your favorite and mine, Akali!

84009.name: K/DA Akali
84009.description: Akali's street aesthetic and hard-hitting lyrics inspired a dedicated fandom. She wields a microphone or kama as a hip-hop ninja, revolutionizing the stale scene with her raw talents.

84013.name: Prestige K/DA Akali
84013.description: K/DA Akali is on fire right now, spitting rap solos at the Pop Music Awards—and her prestigious costume is exactly what you'd expect from the new golden child of pop.

84014.name: PROJECT: Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.

84014.description: A cutting-edge PROJECT subject who somehow escaped the City's boundaries, Akali brings dire warnings of an untested superweapon to those living in the wasteland beyond. With time running out and no other options, these outcasts join her in an attempt to take the mega-corporation down… suspicious that their newfound ally might in fact be a double agent.

84015.name: True Damage Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

84015.description: After the worldwide success of K/DA, Akali made it her mission to recruit accomplished and up-and-coming artists to form a new supergroup: True Damage. Never before has a crew been comprised of such diverse talent, ranging from natural lyricists to renowned producers to legendary vocalists—all ready to disrupt the music industry.

84032.name: K/DA ALL OUT Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

84032.description: Fresh off her success with True Damage, Akali hits the stage full-throttle with her bold edge and fresh new direction. She spits fire with a mic in hand and pushes the band to the bleeding edge, because that's what the baddest do.

84050.name: Crime City Nightmare Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Crime City Nightmare event.

84050.description: A loyal enforcer for the Graves family, Akali took the same deal everyone else did when the Mysterious Gentleman came calling. The power changed her, twisted her into something that hears a siren song echoing from beyond the veil of reality. Now she acts in ruthless, horrific violence, seeking an inscrutable 'balance' even she cannot name.

84060.name: Prestige K/DA Akali (2022)
84060.description: K/DA Akali is on fire right now, spitting rap solos at the Pop Music Awards—and her prestigious costume is exactly what you'd expect from the new golden child of pop.

84061.name: Star Guardian Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Star Guardian event.

84061.description: On-again off-again co-captain of a new generation of Star Guardians, Akali's skill in battle is shadowed by her growing realization that the Oath she swore has condemned her to die. Though she fights for the light with all her heart, she finds that darkness is just as powerful... perhaps, even more so...

85004.name: Kennen M.D.
